Capital

A Interactive Summary of "Capital in the Twenty-First Century" by Thomas Piketty

Aim of Project

Capital is a very thick tome, and I feel that a summary of it would be a nice resource for learning, both for the writer and the reader.

I also needed an outlet for writing and interactive data visualization.
